PHRASE.LANG: You are the hero of Avalon. Only the most celebrated of Knights are bestowed a golden suit of armor. This includes Gold Knight Helm [Female], Gold Knight Breastplate [Female], Gold Knight Chausses [Female], Gold Knight Greaves [Female], Gold Knight Gauntlets [Female], and Gold Knight Sword [Female].[#Legal]

Vous êtes le héros d'Avalon. Seul le plus célèbre des chevaliers sont accordés un costume d'or de l'armure. Inclut Chevalier d'or casque [femme], Chevalier d'or plastron [femme], Chevalier d'or chausses [femme], Chevalier d'or greaves [femme], Chevalier d'or gantelets [femme], et Chevalier d'or glaive [femme].[#Legal]

Du bist der Held von Avalon. Nur die berühmtesten Ritter sind eine goldene Rüstung geschenkt. Beinhaltet Gold-Ritter Helm [weiblich], Gold-Ritter Brustplatte [weiblich], Gold-Ritter Reithosen [weiblich], Gold-Ritter Beinschienen [weiblich], Gold-Ritter Stulpen [weiblich], und Gold-Ritter Klinge [weiblich].[#Legal]

Tu sei l'eroe di Avalon. Solo il più celebre dei Cavalieri sono concesse un abito d'oro di armatura. Include Cavaliere d'oro casco [femmina], Cavaliere d'oro torace armatura [femmina], Cavaliere d'oro brache [femmina], Cavaliere d'oro ciccioli [femmina], Cavaliere d'oro guanti [femmina], e Cavaliere d'oro spada [femmina].[#Legal]

Tú eres el héroe de Avalon. Sólo el más célebre de los Caballeros se otorgó un traje dorado de la armadura. Incluye Caballero de oro casco [mujer], Caballero de oro coraza [mujer], Caballero de oro calzones [mujer], Caballero de oro chicharrones [mujer], Caballero de oro guantes [mujer] y Caballero de oro espada [mujer].[#Legal]

You are the hero of Avalon. Only the most celebrated of Knights are bestowed a golden suit of armor. This includes Gold Knight Helm [Female], Gold Knight Breastplate [Female], Gold Knight Chausses [Female], Gold Knight Greaves [Female], Gold Knight Gauntlets [Female], and Gold Knight Sword [Female].[#Legal]

You are the hero of Avalon. Only the most celebrated of Knights are bestowed a golden suit of armor.
